arguments.description:
one of the following:
			- local (the currency format used in the locale. (default) )
			- international (the international standard currency format of the locale)
			- none (the currency format used in the locale; no currency symbol)
arguments.name: type

arguments.description: Locale to use instead of the locale of the page when processing the function
arguments.name: locale

description: Returns back the formatted EURO currency representation of the number
name: lseurocurrencyformat
